words.source: H3588 conj. ki 'for, because, that'; KJV 'for', ESV 'for', NASB 'for'
H518 conj. ʾim 'if'; KJV 'if', ESV 'if', NASB 'if'
H3986 Piel ptc. ms of מָאֵן 'to refuse'; KJV 'thou refuse', ESV 'you refuse', NASB 'you refuse'
H859 indep. pron. 2ms ʾattah 'you'; KJV 'thou', ESV 'you', NASB 'you'
H7971 prep. l- + Piel inf. constr. of שָׁלַח 'to send'; KJV 'to let them go', ESV 'to let them go', NASB 'to let them go'
H5750 waw + adv. ʿod 'still, yet' + 2ms suff.; KJV 'and wilt hold them still', ESV 'and still hold them', NASB 'and continue to hold'
H2388 Hiphil ptc. ms of חָזַק 'to be strong, seize'; KJV 'hold', ESV 'hold', NASB 'hold'
prep. b- + 3mp suff.; KJV 'them', ESV 'them', NASB 'them'
